appetizers.name: Palak Shorba (Spinach Soup)
appetizers.description: Baby spinach, touch of ginger and garlic pureed with spices.

appetizers.name: Lamb Keema Samosa
appetizers.description: Turnovers stuffed with spiced minced lamb.

appetizers.name: Gobi Manchurian
appetizers.description: Battered cauliflower pieces tossed in a tangy sauce with a touch of chilly and soya sauce.

entrees.name: Paneer Lababdar
entrees.description: Paneer cubes cooked in a tomato sauce with a touch of cashew paste and spices.

entrees.name: Murg Rajmah
entrees.description: Chicken cubes cooked in a light curry sauce with kidney beans.

entrees.name: Lazeez Gosht Handi
entrees.description: Lamb Cubes cooked with special sauce made with a touch of yogurt, cashew paste and light spices.

entrees.name: Malvani Salmon Curry
entrees.description: A curry from Konkan region with onions, tomatoes, spices and fresh grated coconut.
